verses.verse: A Psalm of David. Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> my rock <S%H6697><s%>, Who teacheth <S%H3925><s%> my hands <S%H3027><s%> to war <S%H7128><s%>, And my fingers <S%H676><s%> to fight <S%H4421><s%>:

My lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>, and my fortress <S%H4686><s%>, My high tower <S%H4869><s%>, and my deliverer <S%H6403><s%>; My shield <S%H4043><s%>, and he in whom I take refuge <S%H2620><s%>; Who subdueth <S%H7286><s%> my people under me <S%H5971><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, what is man <S%H120><s%>, that thou takest knowledge <S%H3045><s%> of him <S%H1121><s%>? Or the son of man <S%H582><s%>, that thou makest account of him <S%H2803><s%>?
Man <S%H120><s%> is like <S%H1819><s%> to vanity <S%H1892><s%>: His days <S%H3117><s%> are as a shadow <S%H6738><s%> that passeth away <S%H5674><s%>.
Bow <S%H5186><s%> thy heavens <S%H8064><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and come down <S%H3381><s%>: Touch <S%H5060><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and they shall smoke <S%H6225><s%>.
Cast forth <S%H1299><s%> lightning <S%H1300><s%>, and scatter <S%H6327><s%> them <S%H7971><s%>; Send out thine arrows <S%H2671><s%>, and discomfit them <S%H2000><s%>.

Stretch <S%H7971><s%> forth thy hand <S%H3027><s%> from above <S%H4791><s%>; Rescue <S%H5337><s%> me <S%H5337><s%>, and deliver me out of great <S%H7227><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>, Out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of <S%H5236><s%> aliens <S%H1121><s%>;
Whose mouth <S%H6310><s%> speaketh <S%H1696><s%> deceit <S%H7723><s%>, And whose right hand <S%H3225><s%> is a right hand <S%H3225><s%> of falsehood <S%H8267><s%>.
I will sing <S%H7891><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> song <S%H7892><s%> unto thee <S%H430><s%>, O God: Upon a psaltery <S%H5035><s%> of ten strings <S%H6218><s%> will I sing praises unto thee <S%H2167><s%>.

Thou art he that giveth <S%H5414><s%> salvation <S%H8668><s%> unto kings <S%H4428><s%>; Who rescueth <S%H6475><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> his servant <S%H5650><s%> from the hurtful <S%H7451><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%>.

Rescue <S%H6475><s%> me <S%H5337><s%>, and deliver me out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of <S%H5236><s%> aliens <S%H1121><s%>, Whose mouth <S%H6310><s%> speaketh <S%H1696><s%> deceit <S%H7723><s%>, And whose right hand <S%H3225><s%> is a right hand <S%H3225><s%> of falsehood <S%H8267><s%>.

When our sons <S%H1121><s%> shall be as plants <S%H5195><s%> grown up <S%H1431><s%> in their youth <S%H5271><s%>, And our daughters <S%H1323><s%> as corner-stones <S%H2106><s%> hewn <S%H2404><s%> after the fashion <S%H8403><s%> of a palace <S%H1964><s%>;

When our garners <S%H4200><s%> are full <S%H4392><s%>, affording <S%H6329><s%> all manner of store <S%H2177><s%>, And our sheep <S%H6629><s%> bring forth thousands <S%H503><s%> and ten thousands <S%H503><s%> in our fields <S%H2351><s%>;
When our oxen <S%H441><s%> are well laden <S%H5445><s%>; When there is no breaking in <S%H6556><s%>, and no going forth <S%H3318><s%>, And no outcry <S%H6682><s%> in our streets <S%H7339><s%>:
Happy <S%H835><s%> is the people <S%H5971><s%> that is in such a case <S%H3602><s%>; Yea <S%H835><s%>, happy is the people <S%H5971><s%> whose God <S%H430><s%> is Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
